**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 510 The PCs should choose a name for their kingdom. Record it on their kingdom sheet along with the following initial statistics.
  • The kingdom's level (see [Leveling Up Your Kingdom](/Rules.aspx?ID=1758) is 1, and its maximum level is equal to the party level.
  • The kingdom's [Size](/Rules.aspx?ID=1781) is 1.
  • The kingdom's [Resource Die](/Rules.aspx?ID=1782) is a d4, and its Resource Dice total is 5.
    • The kingdom's [Control DC](/Rules.aspx?ID=1759) is 14.
    • The kingdom's [Consumption](/Rules.aspx?ID=1799) is 0.
    • The kingdom's [Unrest](/Rules.aspx?ID=1785) is 0.
    • All four [Ruins](/Rules.aspx?ID=1784) start at 0, and each Ruin's initial threshold is 10.
  • The kingdom's initial [commodity stores](/Rules.aspx?ID=1790) are 0, and its maximum storage limit for each is 4.
name: Step 6: Record Kingdom Details
